description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、律师，民主进步党籍。现任总统府资政，曾任中华民国驻日代表、行政院院长、高雄市市长、民主进步党主席、立法委员及台北市议会议员。
description.en: A politician and lawyer of the Republic of China, and a member of the Democratic Progressive Party. He is the current Senior Advisor to the President of the Republic of China, and has served as the ROC's Representative to Japan, Premier of the Executive Yuan, Mayor of Kaohsiung, Chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party, a legislator, and a member of the Taipei City Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，现任中华民国总统。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, the current President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统、民主进步党主席。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, former President of the Republic of China and Chairwoman of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统、民主进步党主席。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, former President of the Republic of China and Chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院院长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, former Premier of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院院长、民主进步党主席。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, former Premier of the Executive Yuan and Chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, former President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任高雄市市长、中华民国副总统。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, former Mayor of Kaohsiung and Vice President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，民进党1996年总统选举候选人。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, DPP's presidential candidate in the 1996 election.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任台北市市长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, former Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任台北市市长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, former Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，民进党前主席。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, former Chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 谢长廷的妻子。
description.en: Spouse of Hsieh Chang-ting.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院副院长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, former Vice Premier of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，美丽岛事件受刑人之一。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, one of the defendants in the Formosa Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，姚嘉文的妻子。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, spouse of Yao Chia-wen.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物、外交官，曾任国务委员。
description.en: A politician and diplomat of the People's Republic of China, former State Councilor.

description.zh-cn: 台湾争议性宗教人物。
description.en: A controversial religious figure in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国总统府的无给职荣誉职位，由总统遴聘。
description.en: An unpaid honorary position in the Office of the President of the Republic of China, appointed by the President.

nodes.id: 台北驻日经济文化代表处

zh-cn: 台北驻日经济文化代表处

description.zh-cn: 中华民国在日本的实质大使馆。
description.en: The de facto embassy of the Republic of China in Japan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 民主进步党的最高领导人职位。
description.en: The highest leadership position of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国行政院的最高首长，由总统任命。
description.en: The head of the Executive Yuan of the Republic of China, appointed by the President.

description.zh-cn: 台湾高雄市的最高行政首长。
description.en: The chief executive of Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国立法院的成员，由公民选举产生。
description.en: Members of the Legislative Yuan of the Republic of China, elected by citizens.

description.zh-cn: 台湾台北市议会的成员，由市民选举产生。
description.en: Members of the Taipei City Council in Taiwan, elected by citizens.

description.zh-cn: 民主进步党内的一个派系。
description.en: A faction within the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1979年在台湾高雄市发生的一场重大警民冲突事件，深刻影响了台湾的民主化进程。
description.en: A major police-civilian conflict that occurred in Kaohsiung, Taiwan in 1979, which profoundly influenced Taiwan's democratization process.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国首次举行的总统直接选举。
description.en: The first direct presidential election held in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第十二任总统、副总统选举。
description.en: The 12th presidential and vice-presidential election of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台北市的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Taipei City, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾台北市下的一个区。
description.en: A district in Taipei, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 谢长廷于1946年5月18日出生于台北市大同区。
description.en: Hsieh Chang-ting was born in Datong District, Taipei City on May 18, 1946.

description.zh-cn: 在美丽岛事件发生后，谢长廷加入辩护律师团，此事成为他进入政坛的契机。
description.en: After the Kaohsiung Incident, Hsieh Chang-ting joined the defense legal team, which became his opportunity to enter politics.

description.zh-cn: 周清玉拜托谢长廷担任其丈夫姚嘉文在美丽岛事件中的辩护律师。
description.en: Chou Ching-yu requested Hsieh Chang-ting to be the defense lawyer for her husband, Yao Chia-wen, in the Kaohsiung Incident.

description.zh-cn: 谢长廷是民主进步党创党十人小组成员之一，也是党名的命名者和党纲的起草人。
description.en: Hsieh Chang-ting was one of the ten founding members of the Democratic Progressive Party, as well as the person who named the party and drafted its platform.

description.zh-cn: 在陈水扁担任总统期间，谢长廷被任命为行政院院长。
description.en: During Chen Shui-bian's presidency, Hsieh Chang-ting was appointed as the Premier of the Executive Yuan.

position.en: Vice Premier of the Executive Yuan

description.zh-cn: 在谢长廷担任行政院院长期间，吴荣义担任其副手。
description.en: While Hsieh Chang-ting was the Premier of the Executive Yuan, Wu Rong-i served as his deputy.

relationships.target: 台北驻日经济文化代表处

description.zh-cn: 在蔡英文担任总统期间，谢长廷被任命为驻日代表。
description.en: During Tsai Ing-wen's presidency, Hsieh Chang-ting was appointed as the Representative to Japan.

position.en: Representative to Japan, Senior Advisor to the President

description.zh-cn: 在赖清德担任总统期间，谢长廷先后被任命为驻日代表和总统府资政。
description.en: During Lai Ching-te's presidency, Hsieh Chang-ting was appointed as the Representative to Japan and subsequently as a Senior Advisor to the President.

description.zh-cn: 谢长廷结合姚嘉文、尤清、施明德等人，成立民进党派系“福利国连线”。
description.en: Hsieh Chang-ting, along with Yao Chia-wen, You Ching, and Shih Ming-teh, founded the DPP faction 'Welfare State Alliance'.

description.zh-cn: 谢长廷与彭明敏搭档参选1996年总统选举，最终落败。
description.en: Hsieh Chang-ting ran as the vice-presidential candidate with Peng Ming-min in the 1996 presidential election and was defeated.

description.zh-cn: 以副总统候选人身份与彭明敏搭档参选1996年总统选举。
description.en: Ran as the vice-presidential candidate with Peng Ming-min in the 1996 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 在2006年台北市市长选举中，郝龙斌击败谢长廷。
description.en: Hau Lung-pin defeated Hsieh Chang-ting in the 2006 Taipei mayoral election.

description.zh-cn: 在2008年总统选举中，马英九击败谢长廷。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou defeated Hsieh Chang-ting in the 2008 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 2006年，苏贞昌接替谢长廷担任行政院院长。2008年，二人搭档参选总统选举。
description.en: In 2006, Su Tseng-chang succeeded Hsieh Chang-ting as Premier of the Executive Yuan. In 2008, they ran as running mates in the presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 作为民主进步党创始人和核心人物，长期与中国国民党在政治上竞争和对立，并在多次选举中与其候选人对决。
description.en: As a founder and core figure of the Democratic Progressive Party, he has long been in political competition and opposition with the Kuomintang, and has competed against its candidates in numerous elections.

description.zh-cn: 在1998年高雄市市长选举中，谢长廷击败了时任市长的国民党籍候选人吴敦义。
description.en: In the 1998 Kaohsiung mayoral election, Hsieh Chang-ting defeated the incumbent mayor and KMT candidate Wu Den-yih.

description.zh-cn: 施明德公开指控谢长廷是调查局的卧底特务。
description.en: Shih Ming-teh publicly accused Hsieh Chang-ting of being an undercover agent for the Investigation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 谢长廷曾为宋七力的信徒，公开表明相信其分身概念，并为其拍摄宣传广告。
description.en: Hsieh Chang-ting was a follower of Sung Chi-li, publicly stating his belief in Sung's concept of omnipresence and appeared in his promotional advertisements.

position.zh-cn: 台北市政府市政顾问副总召集人
position.en: Deputy Convener of the Municipal Advisors of Taipei City Government

description.zh-cn: 受时任台北市市长柯文哲聘任为市政顾问副总召集人。
description.en: Appointed as the Deputy Convener of the Municipal Advisors by then-Taipei Mayor Ko Wen-je.

description.zh-cn: 2012年访问中国大陆期间，会见了时任国务委员戴秉国。
description.en: During his visit to mainland China in October 2012, he met with then-State Councilor Dai Bingguo.

description.zh-cn: 与陈水扁、林正杰同时进入台北市议会，被称为“党外三剑客”。
description.en: Entered the Taipei City Council at the same time as Chen Shui-bian and Lin Cheng-chieh, and they were known as the 'Three Musketeers of the Tangwai movement'.
